SEARCH
Package com.dua3.utility.swing

Class SwingGraphics

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.swing.SwingGraphics
All Implemented Interfaces:
Graphics, AutoCloseable
public class SwingGraphics extends Object implements Graphics
The SwingGraphics class implements the Graphics interface for rendering graphics in swing based applications.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.dua3.utility.ui.Graphics

    • convertCovering

      public static Rectangle convertCovering(Rectangle2f r)
      Converts a Rectangle2f object to a Rectangle object.

      The difference to the convert(Rectangle2f) is that the returned rectangle will completely cover the area of the transformed source rectangle even if the covered area of pixels on the border only is covered to less than 50% by the transformed source rectangle.

      Parameters:
      r - the Rectangle2f object to convert
      Returns:
      a Rectangle object with the same position and size as the input

    • convert

      public static AffineTransform convert(AffineTransformation2f t)
      Convert an AffineTransformation2f object to an AffineTransform object.
      Parameters:
      t - the AffineTransformation2f object to convert
      Returns:
      an AffineTransform object with the same transformation as the input

    • resetClip

      public void resetClip()
      Description copied from interface: Graphics
      Resets the clipping area to the default state. This method clears any existing clipping boundaries that might have been set previously and restores the clip to encompass the entire drawing area.
      Specified by:
      resetClip in interface Graphics

    • strokeEllipse

      public void strokeEllipse(float x, float y, float rx, float ry, float angle)
      Description copied from interface: Graphics
      Draws the outline of an ellipse on the canvas with the specified center coordinates and radii.
      Specified by:
      strokeEllipse in interface Graphics
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the center of the ellipse.
      y - The y-coordinate of the center of the ellipse.
      rx - The horizontal radius (semi-major axis) of the ellipse.
      ry - The vertical radius (semi-minor axis) of the ellipse.
      angle - The rotation angle.

    • drawText

      public void drawText(CharSequence text, float x, float y)
      Description copied from interface: Graphics
      Draws the specified text at the given coordinates.

      This is equivalent to calling drawText(text, x, y, HAnchor.LEFT, VAnchor.BASELINE)

      Specified by:
      drawText in interface Graphics
      Parameters:
      text - the text to be drawn
      x - the x-coordinate of the starting point
      y - the y-coordinate of the starting point
